answers.answer: Hi, this could be due to neuropathy, low calcium levels, vitamin B deficiency etc. Other possibility is TIA (transient ischemic attack). How old are you? Any history of hypertension  or diabetes?Please get calcium levels done along with thyroid status. Try vitamin B supplements too.

My grandmother has diabetes and my mother has thyroid problems. It started in leg than up to arm only the upper left arm area. My right side feels fine. But I get very shaky and it does not feel right. Like I'm on a drug (do not use drugs

question: I have been experiencing a numb feeling in my left leg and upper left arm but no pain. It seems that my body get these nerve racking sensations like something in my system is making me feel jittery. Any ideas.
title: Upper left thigh and arm
